name: modulari
description: A Mopidy client built with Electron and the Elm programming language

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules; rm -rf elm-stuff; rm -rf app
scripts.copy: cp src/ports.js app/ports.js && cp src/index.html app/index.html && cp -r src/menus app/menus && cp node_modules/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.css app/styles/font-awesome.css
scripts.build: mkdir -p app/styles && npm run copy && npm run less && npm run elm && npm run electron

author: Alex Lende <ajlende@gmail.com>
